game.title: The Lost City of Gold
game.objective: Raise the ancient temple and claim its treasure.
game.description: Gather resources, build bridges, and overcome obstacles to reach the lost city of gold.
game.reward: A magical amulet worth 1000 gold coins
game.quest-giver: Baroness Elara at the Town Hall

task.objective: Gather 10 wooden planks from the forest.
task.description: You need to collect 10 wooden planks for the bridge construction. Be careful, as the forest is home to many dangers.
task.location: The Forest of Wonders, near the old oak tree

task.objective: Build a bridge over the river using 5 wooden planks and some rope.
task.description: You need to build a sturdy bridge to cross the river. Be careful not to fall into the water!
task.location: The River Crossing, near the old mill

task.objective: Overcome the obstacle of the ancient temple's traps.
task.description: You need to navigate through the treacherous traps and puzzles to reach the heart of the temple.
task.location: The Ancient Temple, near the entrance
